Control Name: Considers a Mix of Ongoing and Separate Evaluations—Management includes a balance of ongoing and separate evaluations.

control_attributes.Control: Considers a Mix of Ongoing and Separate Evaluations—Management includes a balance of ongoing and separate evaluations.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC4.1 COSO Principle 16: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning.
